data.comment: The match is underway at Elland Road.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
In the minute 2, Goal! Harvey Barnes gives Leicester a 0-1 lead in Leeds.
Jamie Vardy with an assist there.
In Leeds, Patrick Bamford (Leeds) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Leicester.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
Andre Marriner awards Leicester a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 8, Wesley Fofana (Leicester) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Leeds.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In the minute 10, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Leeds Leicester drive forward through Harvey Barnes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
In Leeds Leeds attack through Patrick Bamford. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In the minute 16, Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Leicester have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
Jamie Vardy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leicester.
Goal! Youri Tielemans extends Leicester's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Leicester at Elland Road.
Andre Marriner awards Leicester a goal kick.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 28, Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Andre Marriner blows against Leeds's Jamie Shackleton for offside.
In the minute 34, Andre Marriner signals a Leeds throw-in in Leicester's half.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Leicester's Luke Thomas is on target but unsuccessful.
Leeds's Patrick Bamford gets in a shot on goal at Elland Road. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Throw-in Leicester.
Leicester drive upfield and Jamie Vardy gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
In the minute 43, Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
Pablo Hernandez (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 45, Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Andre Marriner will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 45, Free kick in a good position for Leeds!
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In the minute 46, Ian Poveda is replacing Jamie Shackleton for Leeds at Elland Road.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 48, Stuart Dallas puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Jack Harrison.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Stuart Dallas (Leeds) gets a yellow card.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Leicester.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Pablo Hernandez (Leeds) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 56, Leeds to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 59, Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leicester have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
Mateusz Klich for Leeds drives towards goal at Elland Road. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
In the minute 63, Brendan Rodgers (Leicester) is making a first substitution, with James Maddison replacing Dennis Praet.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 67, Tyler Roberts is replacing Pablo Hernandez for the home team.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Leicester pushes forward through Harvey Barnes, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Leicester at Elland Road.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Leeds.
Cengiz Under is on a sub for Harvey Barnes for Leicester.
In the minute 72, Leicester needs to be cautious. Leeds have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
Leeds's Patrick Bamford has run offside.
In the minute 74, Leicester have a goal kick.
Andre Marriner signals a Leeds throw-in in Leicester's half.
Leicester take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Jamie Vardy.
In the minute 76, Cengiz Under instrumental with a fine assist.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leicester's half?
In the minute 80, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 81, Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Leicester's area.
The home team replace Stuart Dallas with Ezgjan Alioski.
Important block from the Leicester defence as Ezgjan Alioski fires in a strike for Leeds.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 83, Leicester's Jamie Vardy misses with an attempt on goal.
Andre Marriner awards Leeds a goal kick.
Free kick Leeds.
In the minute 84, Luke Thomas (Leicester) has received a first yellow card.
Leicester make their third substitution with Wes Morgan replacing Jamie Vardy.
Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 86, Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Leicester have been awarded a penalty...
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Leeds.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jack Harrison (Leeds) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Patrick Bamford for the home team is judged to be offside.
The match has come to a close in Leeds. The final score is 1-4.
Goal! Youri Tielemans extends Leicester's lead from the spot. They now lead 1-4.
